#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t,n,q;
	cin>>t;
	char ch;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>q;
		string s;
		cin>>s;
	
		int ans[300];
		for(int i=0;i<=300;i++)
		{
			ans[i]=0;
		}
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		ans[(int)s[i]]++;
		while(q--)
		{  
			cin>>ch;
			cin>>s;
			//cout<<s<<endl;
			if(s=="even")
			{
				if(ans[(int)ch]%2==0)
				cout<<"yes"<<endl;
				else cout<<"no"<<endl;
			}
			else if(s=="odd")
			{
				if(ans[(int)ch]%2==1)
				cout<<"yes"<<endl;
				else cout<<"no"<<endl;
			}
		}
	}
}
